item.title: Help adding custom - bandos cape
item.dc:creator: @ownerz12 ownerz12
item.description:
@ownerz12 wrote:

im trying to add bandos cape into my server
here are the ints i just need to know where they go

if(i == 11157) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 9152; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 9172; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 9172; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 9152; class8.anInt174 = 59999; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 500; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 14; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 59999; class8.anInt200 = 59999; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Bandos Cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A very powerful Cape".getBytes(); }
my server base is a 525 and those ints are for 508s. so could someone convert those to applet_sub1 ints? iâ€™d really appreciate it
